subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Tyson Gay has his sights on the Olympic trials and a formidable opponent, Usain Bold of Jamaica, who set a startling world record of 9.72 seconds in the 100 meters on May 31.
snippet: Tyson Gay has his sights on the Olympic trials and a formidable opponent, Usain Bold of Jamaica, who set a startling world record of 9.72 seconds in the 100 meters on May 31.
